sqlMap.select: select * from INQUIRYBOARD order by I_BOARD_NUM desc
sqlMap.insert: insert into INQUIRYBOARD values ( IQ_SEQ.nextval, #mem_id#, sysdate, #i_board_contents#, 0, #i_board_title#, #i_board_pass#, #i_board_type# )
sqlMap.select:
select A.* from ( select rownum as rnum, B.* from ( select * from INQUIRYBOARD order by I_BOARD_NUM desc) B
where rownum <= #end#) A where A.rnum >= #start#
select MEM_MAIL from MEMBER where MEM_ID=#mem_id#
